item.title: Hanex add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "There are no shortcuts to any place worth going" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Hanex add a quote by Debbie Ford
item.description: "Your life will be transformed when you make peace with your shadow. The caterpillar will become a breathtakingly beautiful butterfly. You will no longer have to pretend to be someone you're not. You will no longer have to prove you're good enough. When you embrace your shadow you will no longer have to life in fear. Find the gifts of your shadow and you will finally revel in all the glory of your true self. Then you will have the freedom to create the life you have always desired." -- Debbie Ford

item.title: Hanex add a quote by Debbie Ford
item.description: "Each aspect within us needs understanding and compassion. If we are unwilling to give it to ourselves how can we expect the world to give it to us?" -- Debbie Ford

item.title: Hanex add a quote by John Guare
item.description: "It's amazing how a little tomorrow can make up for a whole lot of yesterday." -- John Guare
